title: Bug 6410 - File dirtied by code assist without any changes
description: The file is being marked as dirtied even though no changes are made, and as a result, the code assist feature does not appear.
OB: The file is marked as dirtied, but no changes are made. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes are made. The code assist feature should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Observe that the file is marked as dirtied without any changes.
3. Verify that the code assist feature does not appear.
4. Expected behavior: The file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes are made. The code assist feature should appear as expected when triggered.
